items.description: Provides software to veterinary offices to streamline processes and increase efficiency.
responsibilities: Designed and developed user interface components using Next.js.
Integrated and managed data using PostgreSQL (via Supabase).
Implemented MaterialUI for consistent design across the project.
Developed CRUD operations and managed data tables.
Code Management with Git and GitHub

about.title: About me
about.greeting: ðŸ‘‹ Hey, how's it going? I'm Ignacio, a web developer focus on creating technology experiences that connect with users.
about.intro: I work with React (TypeScript, Next.js) to create intuitive solutions that add value to businesses. I enjoy challenging projects and am expanding my backend skills (Node.js, Express.js, Nest.js) to have a complete stack. I believe in continuous learning and projects with real impact.
about.collaboration: I enjoy collaborating with diverse teams and creating innovative products that generate meaningful results. I'm always looking for challenges that allow me to grow and contribute to the tech world.

footer.description: Web developer specialized in Frontend Development and user interface design, expanding knowledge in Backend Development to build modern and efficient solutions.
